body:
Guild-specific search is now supported - searching from a guild will limit search results to content within that guild. This change was authored by @crystalvulpine.

For the devs out there, the comment fetch API will now also return information about the comment's parent comment.
body_html:
Guild-specific search is now supported - searching from a guild will limit search results to content within that guild. This change was authored by @CrystalVulpine.

For the devs out there, the comment fetch API will now also return information about the comment's parent comment.
title: Ruqqus patch 2.26.4 - Improvements to search and to comment json api.

body:
Cool :3

But unfortunately it appears to be broken right now: https://ruqqus.com/+changelog/search?q=a

It gives you results for all of ruqqus on guild-specific searches. This wasn't the case when I tested it but that was in August so it may not be up to date. I also remember you or @kek saying this was too slow back then, so if you made any changes double check that that isn't causing it.

body:
Thanks. It really wasn't complicated though. All you do is set it to only include the posts that match the specified guild.

https://github.com/ruqqus/ruqqus/pull/411/commits/cc8959ee84fdd648a27df408adc779e8637ddaea

The biggest addition I made was just a copy-paste of the existing search function. The only thing I really added there was the extra guild flag.
body_html:
Thanks. It really wasn't complicated though. All you do is set it to only include the posts that match the specified guild.

https://github.com/ruqqus/ruqqus/pull/411/commits/cc8959ee84fdd648a27df408adc779e8637ddaea

The biggest addition I made was just a copy-paste of the existing search function. The only thing I really added there was the extra guild flag.

body:
[Filter by? Filter by what?](https://web.archive.org/web/20201128194939/https://ruqqus.com/+changelog/search?q=ruqqus) The button has no text on it.

This only happens for guild specific searches.

By the way, nice job, CrystalVulpine. I've always wanted to see this feature.

<sup> - sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, **don't** censor my username]</sup>

body:
I found another issue. If there are no results when you're searching from a guild, then it says that the guild "is barren and needs posts". I think that it should show the same message that's displayed when you're searching across all of ruqqus ("There are no posts here. But the magic gnomes tell us there will be (eventually).").

<sup> - sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, **don't** censor my username]</sup>
body_html:
I found another issue. If there are no results when you're searching from a guild, then it says that the guild "is barren and needs posts". I think that it should show the same message that's displayed when you're searching across all of ruqqus ("There are no posts here. But the magic gnomes tell us there will be (eventually).").

- sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, don't censor my username]
